Well I was doing a little research on the Mimawarigumi... There's 
really not much info about them... I did come across another 
interesting rumor from a livejournal somewhere (can't remember right 
now)... Saitou seems to be related by blood to Mr. Sasaki? I know.. I 
know... All I ever bring to the tables are rumors, just like that 
other woman of Saitou-sama... But really? This just sparked my 
interest because, Saitou joined the Shinsengumi why did he not join 
the Mimawarigumi? If he was related to Mr. Sasaki, wouldn't it have 
been easy? Or was it because his father was a Ronin that it would be 
preposterous for him to join the other patrol group who were composed 
of "higher blood/lineage/ etc".

Anyone have any ideas?

By the way... You can find more photos on the shinsengumi and 
Sasaki's grave at this site...

http://www.fc.a-vst.jp/location_library/shinsengumi/sasaki.html
